page.title: 01KINGUSSIE - SUMMARY
page.content:
This section of countryside lies along the floodbasin of the{River Spey. }It includes a tiny corner of the Burgh of {Kingussie}but mainly the land is agricultural and{farming}provides employment for many. It is also an area of great beauty and attracts many {tourists.}Many visitors return to set up home here and the area contains a vast cross section of personalities and types. Whilst the farming community remains very local, tradesmen and retired folksarrive with varied accents and lifestyles and all seem to find a niche.
Also of interest to visitors, and of pride to the local population are the {Folk Museum, Ruthven Barracks}and the {Bird Reserve}belonging to Royal Society for the Protection of Birds (R.S.P.B.)
